The world's first non-custodial Chrome wallet for Taproot Assets protocol!
Features

-  Create/Import wallet from any device
-  Store and transfer your Assets without running a LightningNetwork-Node
-  Native Taproot Assets address

BitTap Wallet is a browser extension wallet that makes it safe & easy for you to store, send and receive bitcoins and Taproot Assets on bitcoin blockchain. 

BitTap Wallet is a non-custodial wallet. We never have access to your funds. BitTap Wallet never stores your seed phrase, your password or any private information. Your accounts are derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase.
